items.sentence: Please introduce me to the attractive girl who is talking with Tom.
The first time I came to Boston, this restaurant wasn\'t even here.
For as long as Tom could remember, his parents had been overweight.
I almost got killed when I went into the burning house to save Tom.
Tom hated to bother Mary so late at night, but it was an emergency.
Tom needs to renew his passport before the fifteenth of next month.
Tom stepped out of the shower and wrapped a towel around his waist.
I usually take a shower after I play tennis, but today I couldn\'t.
I was just wondering if maybe Tom was the one who started the fire.
I wonder why Tom sang that song, even though Mary asked him not to.
Tom had something important to say, but Mary kept interrupting him.
I rode a motorcycle for three years before I started driving a car.
Tom forgot to ask Mary the question that John had asked him to ask.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve heard Tom play his baritone sax.
Tom gave up his teaching job to become a full-time studio musician.
Tom decided not to play dodge ball because he wasn\'t feeling well.
Tom\'s impeccable manners made a big impression on Mary\'s parents.
I\'m pretty hungry since I haven\'t eaten since early this morning.
I suggest that we go to that new Chinese restaurant on Park Street.
I think that I may not be able to make myself understood in French.
Tom said he really wanted to be here, but he had to stay in Boston.
Tom said that he and Mary are planning to go to Boston next summer.
Tom bumped into Mary because he wasn\'t looking where he was going.
The bread that I bought at the supermarket didn\'t taste very good.
The waiting room was so noisy that I couldn\'t hear my name called.
Can you honestly tell me you didn\'t know this was going to happen?
Have you chosen what you\'re going to wear to the banquet tomorrow?
I\'m not going to tell you unless you tell me why you want to know.
I\'ve read both of these books, but neither of them is interesting.
Tom moved the flower pot to the left and the secret door slid open.
Mary\'s boyfriend saw her dancing with another guy and got jealous.
Recently, I\'ve been thinking about what I want to do with my life.
Let\'s check our facts carefully before we say anything about this.
Are you seriously thinking about getting married again at your age?
Excuse me, but would you please tell me the way to the post office?
Tom would\'ve apologized to Mary if he\'d thought it was important.
We could\'ve saved Tom if we\'d arrived just a few minutes earlier.
You should apologize to Dad for not coming home in time for supper.
You should put an ice pack on your ankle to keep the swelling down.
Tom left his work half done so he could get to the station in time.
Iâ€™ll be in touch again as soon as I have more detailed information.
Tom had to wear a neck brace after Mary pushed him down the stairs.
Tom has a beard just like his father, grandfathers and brothers do.
Tom has no intention of staying in Boston for the rest of his life.
The driver was the only person on the bus that didn\'t get injured.
I would\'ve told you before, but I didn\'t think you\'d understand.
I broke my leg, so I won\'t be playing basketball for a few months.
I didn\'t want to believe the things Tom said about Mary yesterday.
I have a pretty good idea who Tom will be hanging out with tonight.
Who do you think will be the first one in our class to get married?
